original_title: Amrus Natalsya yang membuat kembali keluarga tandus disendja
overview: In 1965, Indonesian artist Amrus Natalsya was one of the many artists arrested during the violent purge of communists and their sympathisers, after the failed coup by the September 30th Movement. Natalsya was released in 1973.
title: Amrus Natalsya Who Recreates the Dispossessed in Twilight
